clear_locationbar_description.message: The automatic emptying of the location bar will be possible again in later versions of Firefox. This requires a change by Mozilla.

compat_notice_message.message: New Tab Override was developed from the ground up as so-called WebExtension. This makes New Tab Override compatible with Firefox 57 and later. Not all options of the previous version are currently available as WebExtension. As soon as Mozilla implements support for missing functionalities in Firefox, they will be integrated in a future update of New Tab Override.

default_option_description.message: To use Firefox's default page, please open about:addons and disable the New Tab Override add-on (no uninstall required).

extension_description.message: Deze add-on herstelt de mogelijkheid om de pagina te wijzigen die bij het openen van een nieuw tabblad wordt weergegeven.

focus_website_description.message: Focus op de webpagina leggen in plaats van de locatiebalk

github_notice.message: Feature requests or error report? Open a ticket on GitHub:

introduction_part_two.message: Selecteer welke pagina als nieuw tabblad moet worden geopend!

omnibox_default_description.message: New Tab Override brings back the ability to change the page which is shown when opening a new tab

review_text.message: Bevalt de add-on u? Laat dan een beoordeling achter op

settings_donation_text.message: Overweeg een donatie om de actieve ontwikkeling van deze add-on te steunen.

settings_feed_permission_description.message: Firefox needs your permission to read the news feed from soeren-hentzschel.at. You can revoke this permission at any time.

settings_feed_permission_needed.message: To use this feature you have to allow Firefox to access the data source.

settings_feed_permission_revoke_descript.message: Firefox needs your permission to read the news feed from soeren-hentzschel.at. You have already granted this permission.

upgrade_notice_message.message: Users of previous versions of New Tab Override need to reconfigure the add-on.

url_description.message: Deze pagina wordt bij het openen van een nieuw tabblad weergegeven als de optie „aangepaste URL“ is geselecteerd.

url_validation_default.message: This is not a valid URL.
